    rcwChart

    2017-07-09

    x y highlightIndex
    1000 15 -1
    1001 -20 -1
    1010 10 0
    1011 40 -1
    1100 30 -1
    1101 25 -1
    1110 65 1
    1111 27 -1

    Bar Chart

    rcwChart(rcwData, type = "bar")

    Scatter Chart

    rcwChart(rcwData, type = "scatter")

    Row Chart

    rcwChart(rcwData, type = "row")
